frontMatter.title: Dates
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to ask users for dates including birth dates, service dates, and date ranges.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern when collecting date information from users, including memorized dates, approximate dates, and date ranges.

when_to_use.value: **Memorized dates.** Dates users know by heart like date of birth or anniversary dates.
**Approximate dates.** Dates users may not remember exactly, like when they received a diploma (month/year only).
**Date ranges.** Periods of time like service history or employment dates.

design_principles.value: **Use clear labeling for ranges.** Avoid 'From/To' labels; use specific descriptors like 'Start date' and 'End date'.
**Display full month names.** Show complete month names in selected states to reduce confusion.
**Provide input validation.** Give immediate feedback for incorrect date entries.
**Use a single field for birth dates.** Reduces format confusion compared to separate fields.
**Pair with names.** Date of birth collection typically appears alongside the full name pattern.

examples.title: Date of birth
examples.description: Single memorable date field for collecting a user's birth date.

examples.title: Approximate date
examples.description: Month and year only fields for dates users may not remember exactly.

examples.title: Date range
examples.description: Start and end date fields for collecting a period of time.

how_to_build.intro: Choose the appropriate date component based on the precision needed.

steps.value: For known dates (birth dates, specific events), use the memorable date component.
For approximate dates, use the month/year date input variation.
For place of birth, use a single text input to accommodate diverse birth locations.
Include clear validation messages for invalid entries.

frontMatter.code_usage:
Date patterns are available as web-components in the VA Forms library.

```jsx
import { datePatterns } from '@department-of-veterans-affairs/platform-forms-system/patterns';
```

See the [vets-website repository](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-website) for implementation details.

content_specs.hint_text: Select a month. Enter 1 or 2 digits for day and 4 digits for year.

content_specs.error_message: Enter a year between 1900 and the current year

accessibility.value: Ensure date fields are properly labeled and associated with their inputs.
Provide clear error messages that explain the expected format.
Use ARIA attributes to announce validation errors to screen readers.
